story_21_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
All right, listen up! We’re starting the opening
ceremony for the PML finals!
story_21_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Lear’s not doing the opening announcement?
What’s going on?
story_21_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You and your Pokémon all pushed yourselves to
the limit to make it this far in the competition.
story_21_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You all got guts—that’s for sure!
Pat yourselves on the back!
story_21_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
But that’s not good enough, is it?
I figure most of you came here to win...
story_21_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
so let’s see it! Duke it out to your heart’s content!
You’re here to prove that you’re the best, aren’t
you? Well, here’s your chance!
story_21_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: The PML finals is your stage! It’s time to show off!
story_21_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I didn’t think I’d see Sawyer being master
of ceremonies.
story_21_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I didn’t think he’d be so good at it! I’m glad it was
him and not Lear! Can you imagine Lear saying
anything like that?
story_21_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I wonder what’s going on, though...
Lear doesn’t seem like the type to pass up being
in the spotlight.
story_21_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Could he still be moping around because of
our battle? Either way...
story_21_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
our first match is about to start!
Let’s focus on the tournament for now.
story_21_02000/2401_0401_1500_10: That’s the spirit! Let’s go for the win!
story_21_02000/2401_0401_1600_10:
We have to focus if we want to have our rematch
with Lear, right?
story_21_02000/2401_0302_1700_10: I wonder if Lear is OK.
story_21_02000/2401_0402_1800_10:
It’s probably best if we put Lear out of our minds
for now—for his sake as well.
story_21_02000/2401_0402_1900_10:
We have to focus if we want to have our rematch
with him.
story_21_02000/2401_1101_2000_20:
Attention, all sync pairs: The first match of
the finals will begin momentarily.
story_21_02000/2401_1001_2200_10: Yeah! Let’s see. Our first opponent is...
